casebody.data:
OCWEN LOAN SERVICING
v.
REAVES 75P17-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Margaret W. Reaves, for Reaves, Margaret Ann. G. Benjamin Milam, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Ocwen Loan Servicing, LLC

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of June 2018 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
